sentences.sContent: He told them exactly how wrongheaded they were.
sentences.sCn: 他实实在在地跟他们说他们有多执迷不悟。

words.tran: 错误的；失常的；不适当的
错误地；邪恶的，不正当地
错误地；不恰当地；不公正地

trans.tranCn: 坚持错误的， 固执的
trans.tranOther: used to describe an idea, plan, or belief that someone has, that is based on wrong ideas that they are not willing to change
